author: Jesse Klein, Hilary Pollack
title: The #Vanlife Movement Is Figuring Out How to Shelter-In-Place on the Road
description: With public lands closing during the coronavirus pandemic, van dwellers are turning to a collaborative Google spreadsheet for support.
content: Almost 316 million people across the United States have been told to shelter in place by their governors, mayors and President Trump because of the COVID-19 global outbreak. #Stayhome has become a ubiquitous hashtag on Instagram, the mantra of 2020 and a cros… [+5478 chars]
